the_vault:hint.note1.en_us: [{"text":"在一次宝库中","color":"white"},{"text":"击晕","color":"yellow"},{"text":"很多怪物似乎会给我什么特殊的东西……","color":"white"}]

the_vault:hint.note2.en_us: [{"text":"我应该试试在宝库中","color":"white"},{"text":"连锁攻击","color":"yellow"},{"text":"一大堆","color":"green"},{"text":"怪物，重复几次……","color":"white"}]

the_vault:hint.note3.en_us: [{"text":"我给自己设定了一个目标，通过","color":"white"},{"text":"荆棘","color":"yellow"},{"text":"在单个宝库中造成","color":"white"},{"text":"大量伤害","color":"green"},{"text":"！","color":"white"}]

the_vault:hint.note4.en_us: [{"text":"想象一下我在一次宝库中","color":"white"},{"text":"连续格挡10次","color":"yellow"},{"text":"时敌人耳边的响起的铃声……","color":"white"}]

the_vault:hint.note5.en_us: [{"text":"要变成一个海龟，你需要在","color":"white"},{"text":"击杀守卫","color":"yellow"},{"text":"时","color":"white"},{"text":"穿着一个海龟帽","color":"yellow"},{"text":"……","color":"white"}]

the_vault:hint.note6.en_us: [{"text":"使用超过","color":"white"},{"text":"189个宝库金币","color":"yellow"},{"text":"来复活我的灵魂应该会让我打开","color":"white"},{"text":"死亡之门","color":"yellow"}]
